00013 //When line of sight reaches a gridno, and there is a light there, it turns it on.
00014 //This is only done in the cave levels.
00015 void RemoveFogFromGridNo( UINT32 uiGridNo )
00016 {
00017       INT32 i;
00018       INT32 x, y;
00019       UINT32 uiAdjacentGridNo = 0;
00020       x = uiGridNo % WORLD_COLS;
00021       y = uiGridNo / WORLD_COLS;
00022       for( i = 0; i < MAX_LIGHT_SPRITES; i++ )
00023       {
00024             if( LightSprites[ i ].iX == x && LightSprites[ i ].iY == y )
00025             {
00026                   if( !(LightSprites[ i ].uiFlags & LIGHT_SPR_ON) )
00027                   {
00028                         LightSpritePower( i, TRUE );
00029                         LightDraw(  LightSprites[i].uiLightType, LightSprites[i].iTemplate, LightSprites[i].iX, LightSprites[i].iY, i );
00030                         MarkWorldDirty();
00031                         return;
00032                   }
00033             }
00034       }
00035 }
